title: Multiple earthed neutral (MEN) system
fullText: A system of earthing in which the parts of an installation, required under this Standard to be earthed, are connected to the general mass of earth and, in addition, are connected within the installation to the neutral conductor of the supply system or the PEN conductor. Within the installation, the protective earthing conductor is separated from the neutral conductor. Multiple electrical installation (see Clause 1.4.54 Electrical installation, multiple).
